alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 8:42PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Patchy Freezing Drizzle, Areas Of Fog This Evening... Patchy freezing drizzle along with areas of fog will persist through much of the late evening hours. Visibilities will be reduced to a mile or less at times. Icy spots could develop on untreated roads and elevated surfaces. Take it slow and drive with caution if traveling this evening. The fog and freezing drizzle will be swept away with a west to east moving cold front by midnight, although the colder air in the wake of the front could further result in localized icy spots on roads. In addition, gusty northwest winds will drop wind chills into teens below zero overnight.
